title: The Cigar Authority Gets Lucky!
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Gets Lucky!
description: We've got 1,000 boxes of Lucky Charms. Why? Tune in and find out. We light up the Camacho Triple Maduro, and later in the show bring on Clint Aaron from 262 Cigars, aka The Revolution, to tell us about their new cigar: Ideology. It's time to tune in and light up!
